dcterms:creator: Ruining He
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: A dataset widely used for movie recommendations, consisting of user ratings and attribute information for movies. The MovieLens-100k version includes predefined relations such as 'release year' and 'genre', and additional movie information is crawled from IMDB.
dcterms:title: MovieLens

dcterms:creator: Ruining He
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: A subset of the Amazon e-commerce dataset representing office products, containing user ratings, reviews, and rich item metadata. It includes predefined relations such as 'category' and 'brand', and co-occurrence information like 'also buy' and 'also view'.
dcterms:title: Amazon Office Products

dcterms:creator: Ruining He
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: A subset of the Amazon e-commerce dataset representing electronics, containing user ratings, reviews, and rich item metadata. It includes predefined relations such as 'category' and 'brand', and co-occurrence information like 'also buy' and 'also view'.
dcterms:title: Amazon Electronics
